title: First Ride
description: I’m going to be the first, last and only man in her life.The biker, the good girl and the bank robber.That’s how our story begins. I walk into the bank to get a little cash and end up running into my future, my soulmate. The curvy beauty steals my heart on the spot.Before I’m able to make a move, a masked criminal walks in and robs the bank.The bad guy is supposed to be one of the good guys and my girl recognizes him. If he ever realizes there’s a witness who can identify him, he’ll kill her.Now, I’ll do whatever it takes to keep my girl safe. After eliminating this threat, I plan on making her mine forever. Her first ride with me is going to last a lifetime.If you like over-the-top, insta-love romance with a little bit of humor, and tiny amount of drama this short romance is the perfect story for you. Like all Loni Ree books, the drama is light and the romance is fast.
author: Loni Ree
